Html:
On NuGet the latest QuickGraph version is 3.6.61119.7.
The version info found in Source Code commit #69709 file 3.0\sources\version.cs is 3.6.61114.00.

How can I get the source code for the QuickGraph version is 3.6.61119.7 ?

Thanks
Maybe its the same source code but compiled some minutes after the commit? I think the last two digits indicate the build time...

It seems that the NuGet package version differs from the assembly version.
The NuGet package version 3.6.61119.7 comes with assembly version 3.6.61114.0.
So the available source code matches the latest assembly version.
